Hi  anyone with vezel or hr-v with this problem? Car cannot start and Battery is new and healthy. AAA came and check  battery ok. AAA did something   then he turn the steering wheel clockwise and anti clockwise. Then the car can start but the symbols still have  after drive for a while the symbols all disappeared. Was told to go â€œresetâ€ at workshop. Reset what sia?
Vezel/HRV is famous for Christmas lights
Must go workshop to reset error codes?
If U have the thing lor

Steering Lock Issue: Many cars  including the Honda Vezel and HR-V  have an electronic steering lock system. If the system malfunctions or detects an error (e.g.  improper key signal)  the car won't start. Turning the steering wheel clockwise and anti-clockwise might have disengaged the lock  allowing the car to start again.
Ahhh I see thank you for your reply!

I have another question about Honda vezel/hr-v. sometimes when I donâ€™t turn on the automatic engine idle button  when the car is idling  suddenly when I want to drive off  the car stops  and I have to restart the car. So I have been turning on the button to turn off the automatic engine idle function. Any idea what why the car fully stop during and wonâ€™t restart during automatic engine idle is happening?
Why donâ€™t you bring to workshop for a proper check by the professional?
Check already  they said nothing wrong. Just wondering if anyone encounter similar issues  thank you

The idle-stop function relies on the starter motor to quickly restart the engine. A worn-out or dirty starter motor might fail to operate properly  resulting in the car stalling when u try to drive off.
Ahh I see  I will check this when I go workshop thank you!
